page.content: Griffin Schools survey showed a{wide} {variation in jobs}from{professional people-a teacher and an accountant, {skilled}workers a plumber and a diesel engineer to{unskilled}jobs_a builders labourer.There were no{jobs}connected with the{Textile}industry for which Blackburn was once famous.{75%}of the replies showed that{women}of the households{worked}outside the home and of these{50%}had{part time}jobs.None of the people who replied had extra jobs besides their main ones.An {important point}which the survey shows was the{number}of{previous jobs}people have had .For{males}the average was {5.5 previous}jobs and for{females}it was{4.7 .All}but three people{had jobs in{Blackburn .More men}than women travelled to work by{car}and showed that many of the{womens jobs}were within{a short distance}of home.
